description.ro: A te simti rau este o stare generala de disconfort emotional care semnaleaza ca ceva nu functioneaza bine in viata ta. Este un semnal difuz care poate include oboseala, nemultumire, lipsa de energie sau dezechilibru. Aceasta stare merita atentie si explorare — sub eticheta 'rau' se ascund adesea emotii mai specifice care cer raspunsuri diferite.
description.en: Feeling bad is a general state of emotional discomfort signaling that something isn't working well in your life. It is a diffuse signal that can include fatigue, dissatisfaction, lack of energy, or imbalance. This state deserves attention and exploration — beneath the label 'bad' often hide more specific emotions that require different responses.

description.ro: Oboseala emotionala este semnalul ca resursele tale sunt epuizate si ai nevoie de recuperare. Nu este doar fizica — poate fi oboseala de a pretinde, de a performa sau de a face fata stresului cronic. Oboseala ignorata duce la epuizare si la pierderea capacitatii de a simti. Odihna nu este lene, ci o necesitate pentru functionarea sanatoasa.
description.en: Emotional tiredness is the signal that your resources are depleted and you need recovery. It is not just physical — it can be the fatigue of pretending, performing, or coping with chronic stress. Ignored tiredness leads to burnout and the loss of the capacity to feel. Rest is not laziness, but a necessity for healthy functioning.

description.ro: Stresul este raspunsul organismului la cerinte care depasesc resursele percepute. Corpul se activeaza pentru performanta, dar daca activarea este cronica, sistemele se uzeaza. Stresul moderat poate fi motivant; stresul cronic erodeaza sanatatea fizica si mentala. Gestionarea stresului incepe cu recunoasterea limitelor si prioritizarea nevoilor autentice.
description.en: Stress is the body's response to demands that exceed perceived resources. The body activates for performance, but if activation is chronic, systems wear down. Moderate stress can be motivating; chronic stress erodes physical and mental health. Managing stress begins with recognizing limits and prioritizing authentic needs.

description.ro: A te simti coplesit inseamna ca cerintele depasesc capacitatea ta de a le gestiona in acest moment. Este semnalul ca ai nevoie sa eliberezi presiunea — fie prin delegare, fie prin renuntare la ceea ce nu este esential. Coplesirea cronica erodeaza increderea in sine si poate duce la epuizare emotionala si fizica.
description.en: Feeling overwhelmed means that demands exceed your capacity to manage them right now. It is the signal that you need to release pressure — either through delegation or by letting go of what isn't essential. Chronic overwhelm erodes self-confidence and can lead to emotional and physical burnout.

description.ro: Plictiseala este semnalul ca stimularea actuala nu iti satisface nevoile de angajament si sens. Nu este un esec personal, ci un mesaj de la psihicul tau ca trebuie sa schimbi ceva. Plictiseala poate fi catalizatorul creativitatii si al schimbarii daca o asculti, sau poate duce la comportamente disfunctionale daca o anestezezi.
description.en: Boredom is the signal that current stimulation doesn't satisfy your needs for engagement and meaning. It is not a personal failure, but a message from your psyche that something needs to change. Boredom can be the catalyst of creativity and change if you listen to it, or can lead to dysfunctional behaviors if you numb it.

description.ro: Somnolenta este semnalul primar al corpului ca necesita odihna si regenerare. Poate fi pur fiziologica sau poate reflecta o retragere emotionala — o dorinta inconstienta de a te deconecta de la o realitate suprasolicitanta. Somnolenta persistenta in contexte nepotrivite merita investigata, deoarece poate indica depresie sau epuizare emotionala.
description.en: Sleepiness is the body's primary signal that it needs rest and regeneration. It can be purely physiological or can reflect an emotional withdrawal — an unconscious desire to disconnect from an overwhelming reality. Persistent sleepiness in inappropriate contexts deserves investigation, as it may indicate depression or emotional exhaustion.

description.ro: Lipsa de concentrare este incapacitatea de a-ti directiona si mentine atentia pe un singur lucru. Poate semnala oboseala, supraincarcare cognitiva sau evitarea emotionala a ceva dificil. Mintea ta iti spune ca ceva nu este in regula — fie ai nevoie de pauza, fie exista o emotie nesupravizata care iti cere atentia.
description.en: Unfocusedness is the inability to direct and maintain your attention on a single thing. It can signal fatigue, cognitive overload, or emotional avoidance of something difficult. Your mind is telling you something isn't right — either you need a break, or there's an unsupervised emotion demanding your attention.

description.ro: A fi coplesit inseamna ca volumul cerintelor a depasit capacitatea ta de procesare. Te simti ingropat, incapabil sa stabilesti prioritati si paralizat de multimea sarcinilor. Coplesirea este un semnal ca trebuie sa te opresti, sa respiri si sa ceri ajutor. Nu este un semn de slabiciune, ci de onestitate fata de limitele umane reale.
description.en: Being overwhelmed means that the volume of demands has exceeded your processing capacity. You feel buried, unable to prioritize, and paralyzed by the multitude of tasks. Overwhelm is a signal that you need to stop, breathe, and ask for help. It is not a sign of weakness, but of honesty about real human limits.

description.ro: Sentimentul de a fi scapat de sub control este experienta terifianta ca nu mai poti influenta directia vietii tale. Evenimentele te depasesc, deciziile ti se iau de altii si te simti ca un pasager in propria existenta. Aceasta stare activeaza anxietatea profunda si necesita recastigarea agentivitatii, pas cu pas, incepand cu lucrurile mici.
description.en: Feeling out of control is the terrifying experience that you can no longer influence the direction of your life. Events overwhelm you, decisions are made by others, and you feel like a passenger in your own existence. This state activates deep anxiety and requires regaining agency, step by step, starting with small things.

description.ro: Presiunea este senzatia de a fi impins din toate directiile — de timp, de asteptari sau de responsabilitati. Te simti comprimat si fara spatiu de miscare. Presiunea moderata poate stimula performanta, dar presiunea cronica duce la epuizare si la pierderea bucuriei. Este esential sa identifici ce presiuni sunt reale si care sunt auto-impuse.
description.en: Pressure is the sensation of being pushed from all directions — by time, expectations, or responsibilities. You feel compressed and without room to move. Moderate pressure can stimulate performance, but chronic pressure leads to burnout and loss of joy. It is essential to identify which pressures are real and which are self-imposed.

description.ro: Graba este senzatia ca timpul curge mai repede decat poti actiona — o urgenta constanta care nu iti permite sa fii prezent. In graba, calitatea gandurilor, relatiilor si deciziilor se deterioreaza. Graba cronica este adesea o fugire de sine — daca te opresti, trebuie sa te confrunti cu ce simti cu adevarat.
description.en: Feeling rushed is the sensation that time flows faster than you can act — a constant urgency that doesn't allow you to be present. In a rush, the quality of thoughts, relationships, and decisions deteriorates. Chronic rushing is often a flight from the self — if you stop, you must confront what you truly feel.

description.ro: Indiferenta este absenta investitiei emotionale — nimic nu te mai atrage si nimic nu te mai deranjeaza. Poate fi o protectie temporara dupa suprasolicitare emotionala sau un semn ingrijorator de detasare cronica. Indiferenta prelungita erodeaza relatiile si sensul vietii. Recuperarea incepe cu reconectarea treptata la lucruri mici care iti trezesc simtirea.
description.en: Indifference is the absence of emotional investment — nothing attracts you anymore and nothing disturbs you. It can be temporary protection after emotional overload or a concerning sign of chronic detachment. Prolonged indifference erodes relationships and life's meaning. Recovery begins with gradual reconnection to small things that awaken your feeling.

description.ro: Apatia este forma profunda a indeferentei — o stare in care nu mai ai energie, motivatie sau dorinta de a actiona. Este ca si cum motorul emotional s-a oprit. Apatia poate fi un simptom al depresiei, al epuizarii severe sau al pierderii de sens. Nu este lene — este o stare de suferinta care necesita compasiune si sprijin profesional.
description.en: Apathy is the deep form of indifference — a state where you no longer have energy, motivation, or desire to act. It's as if the emotional engine has stopped. Apathy can be a symptom of depression, severe burnout, or loss of meaning. It is not laziness — it is a state of suffering that requires compassion and professional support.

description.ro: Epuizarea este starea in care rezervele tale emotionale si energetice au fost consumate complet — nu mai ai din ce da. Este mai profunda decat oboseala obisnuita; este sentimentul ca s-a cerut prea mult de la tine, prea mult timp, fara reumplere. Epuizarea este un semnal de alarma ca echilibrul dintre dare si primire s-a rupt si ca ai nevoie urgenta de recuperare.
description.en: Feeling drained is the state where your emotional and energetic reserves have been completely consumed — you have nothing left to give. It is deeper than ordinary tiredness; it is the feeling that too much has been demanded of you, for too long, without replenishment. Being drained is an alarm signal that the balance between giving and receiving has broken and you urgently need recovery.

description.ro: Suprasolicitarea este senzatia ca ai prea multe lucruri deodata — informatii, sarcini, cerinte, stimuli — si capacitatea ta de procesare a fost depasita. Nu este vorba de dificultatea lucrurilor, ci de volumul lor. Mintea se simte ca un circuit supraincarcat care este pe punctul de a se deconecta. Suprasolicitarea este un semnal ca trebuie sa reduci, nu sa accelerezi — sa scoti din lista, nu sa adaugi strategii noi.
description.en: Feeling overloaded is the sensation of having too many things at once — information, tasks, demands, stimuli — and your processing capacity has been exceeded. It is not about the difficulty of things, but their volume. The mind feels like an overloaded circuit on the verge of shutting down. Being overloaded is a signal that you need to reduce, not accelerate — to remove from the list, not add new strategies.

description.ro: Nelinistea din substimulare este o agitatie difuza care apare cand energia ta nu are unde sa se duca — vrei ceva, dar nu stii ce. Este plictiseala transformata in tensiune corporala: nu poti sta locului, nu te poti concentra, dar nici nu gasesti ceva care sa te angajeze. Aceasta stare este un semnal ca ai nevoie de stimulare cu sens — nu de orice distragere, ci de ceva care sa iti capteze cu adevarat atentia.
description.en: Restlessness from understimulation is a diffuse agitation that arises when your energy has nowhere to go — you want something, but you do not know what. It is boredom transformed into bodily tension: you cannot sit still, you cannot focus, yet you cannot find anything that engages you. This state is a signal that you need meaningful stimulation — not just any distraction, but something that truly captures your attention and channels your energy.

description.ro: Tensiunea este stresul inscris in corp — muschii se incordeaza, maxilarul se strange, umerii se ridica si respiratia devine superficiala. Este semnalul fizic ca sistemul tau nervos este in alerta prelungita fara descarcare. Tensiunea cronica poate duce la dureri de cap, de spate si la probleme digestive. Corpul tau iti cere sa te opresti, sa respiri adanc si sa eliberezi constient ceea ce retii. Relaxarea nu este un lux, ci o necesitate fiziologica.
description.en: Tension is stress inscribed in the body — muscles tighten, jaw clenches, shoulders rise, and breathing becomes shallow. It is the physical signal that your nervous system is on prolonged alert without discharge. Chronic tension can lead to headaches, back pain, and digestive problems. Your body is asking you to stop, breathe deeply, and consciously release what you are holding. Relaxation is not a luxury, but a physiological necessity.

description.ro: Epuizarea profesionala este starea de golire emotionala care apare dupa o perioada prelungita de suprasolicitare fara recuperare suficienta — nu doar oboseala, ci pierderea capacitatii de a mai simti motivatie, empatie sau satisfactie in legatura cu munca ta. Simti ca dai din ce nu mai ai. Epuizarea profesionala nu este un esec personal, ci semnalul ca echilibrul dintre dare si primire s-a rupt fundamental. Recuperarea necesita nu doar odihna, ci o reevaluare profunda a modului in care iti investesti resursele emotionale.
description.en: Burnout is the state of emotional emptying that occurs after a prolonged period of overexertion without sufficient recovery — not just fatigue, but the loss of the capacity to feel motivation, empathy, or satisfaction regarding your work. You feel you are giving from what you no longer have. Burnout is not a personal failure, but a signal that the balance between giving and receiving has fundamentally broken. Recovery requires not just rest, but a deep reassessment of how you invest your emotional resources.

description.ro: A fi cu nervii intinsi este starea de hipervigilenta iritabila in care orice mic stimul te poate face sa explodezi — esti stresat pana la limita si nu mai ai niciun tampon emotional intre tine si lume. Te simti ca un arc intins la maxim, gata sa sara la orice atingere. Aceasta stare combina oboseala cu alerta si semnaleaza ca rezervele tale emotionale sunt aproape epuizate. Ai nevoie urgent de reducerea stimulilor si de un spatiu sigur in care sa te decompresezi.
description.en: Being on edge is a state of hypervigilant irritability where any small stimulus can make you snap — you are stressed to the limit with no emotional buffer left between you and the world. You feel like a spring stretched to maximum, ready to leap at any touch. This state combines fatigue with alertness and signals that your emotional reserves are nearly depleted. You urgently need stimulus reduction and a safe space to decompress.

description.ro: Irascibilitatea este pragul scazut de toleranta care apare cand stresul ti-a epuizat resursele — lucruri care in mod normal nu te-ar deranja acum te enerveaza intens. Este furia la suprafata, gata sa izbucneasca la cea mai mica provocare. Irascibilitatea nu este despre ceilalti — este despre starea ta interioara de suprasolicitate. Este un semnal ca ai acumulat prea multa tensiune fara sa o eliberezi. In loc sa te invinuiesti pentru reactiile tale, recunoaste-le ca un semn ca ai nevoie de grija.
description.en: Irritability is the lowered tolerance threshold that appears when stress has depleted your resources — things that normally wouldn't bother you now intensely annoy you. It is anger at the surface, ready to erupt at the slightest provocation. Irritability is not about others — it is about your inner state of overload. It is a signal that you have accumulated too much tension without releasing it. Instead of blaming yourself for your reactions, recognize them as a sign that you need care.

description.ro: Ceata mentala este starea in care gandurile devin opace si lente — ca si cum ai privi lumea prin sticla aburita. Nu poti gandi clar, nu poti lua decizii si totul pare deconectat si indepartat. Ceata mentala poate fi semnalul oboselii acumulate, al stresului cronic sau al supraincarcarii emotionale. Nu este lipsa de inteligenta, ci un creier care cere o pauza. Claritatea revine cand ii oferi corpului si mintii repausul de care au nevoie.
description.en: Mental fog is the state where thoughts become opaque and slow — as if you were looking at the world through steamed glass. You cannot think clearly, you cannot make decisions, and everything seems disconnected and distant. Mental fog can signal accumulated fatigue, chronic stress, or emotional overload. It is not a lack of intelligence, but a brain asking for a break. Clarity returns when you give your body and mind the rest they need.

description.ro: A te simti blocat este frustrarea tacuta a stagnarii — vrei sa mergi inainte dar nu gasesti cum. Nu este lipsa de dorinta, ci lipsa de directie sau de energie. Simti ca te invartesti in cerc sau ca stai pe loc in timp ce viata trece pe langa tine. Blocajul poate semnala un conflict intern nerezolvat, frica de esec sau nevoia de o perspectiva noua. Deblocarea vine rareori din efort mai mare pe acelasi drum — vine din a incerca o directie diferita sau din a cere ajutor.
description.en: Feeling stuck is the quiet frustration of stagnation — you want to move forward but cannot find how. It is not a lack of desire, but a lack of direction or energy. You feel you are going in circles or standing still while life passes you by. Being stuck can signal an unresolved internal conflict, fear of failure, or the need for a new perspective. Unblocking rarely comes from greater effort on the same path — it comes from trying a different direction or asking for help.

needs.ro: perspectiva noua si un prim pas
needs.en: new perspective and a first step
